name: Space Junk (itch) (Geibu3D)
description:
The galaxy is filled with garbage!

Your job is to clean up that garbage! Hop into your garbage disposal craft and blast that debris into smaller debris!

It's a dirty job, but it also has a high turn-around rate. Will you survive long enough to make sure the final frontier is free of waste? Watch out for small asteroids!

How to Play
----------------
Press Enter to start and pause

Use the A and D keys to move left and right. Left Ctrl to shoot. 

Good luck on your mission!
